column1: Little Goat Diner////A good dining experience
column2: but not 4 stars. The restaurant had amazing natural lighting which I enjoyed most. I had the bulls eye French toast. While it wasn't bad
column3: I wasn't amazed. Each of the components
column4: the French toast and fried chicken
column5: were great individually. I couldn't dig the combination of tastes though and for that it only gets 3 stars. My girlfriend had "this little piggy went to China"
column6: again the attempt to merge tastes
column8: Asian spices with normal American foods didn't impress us. I probably wouldn't return again as it was overpriced and did not wow us. However
